thread.title: Truckers Again Becoming More Competitive With Rail
thread.title_full: Truckers Again Becoming More Competitive With Rail - WSJ

author: Laura Stevens
title: Truckers Again Becoming More Competitive With Rail
text:
Fuel prices are low enough that truckers are again becoming more competitive with rail, executives at Union Pacific Corp. said Thursday.
For years, railroads like Union Pacific have been developing their intermodal businesses of moving containers and trailers, allowing them to compete directly with truckers on their home turf. As fuel prices skyrocketed and trucking companies faced driver and capacity crunches, railroads became a...
